titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on product mixtures containing Clothianidin and Bacillus Firmus.
A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on product mixtures containing Clothianidin and Bacillus Firmus.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on product mixtures containing Clothianidin and Bacillus Firmus.
